name: Kanata
description: Using chopsticks in a western restaurant, drinking tea with macaron, writing poems while drinking, enjoys singing and dancing... The Hanasaki family runs a temple, but this strange successor is giving the elders a big headache.

passiveSkill.name: Eccentric
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "No desire for nirvana, no sin deserving hell. Having lived a life to the fullest, death is merely retirement. When Kanata joins the battle, increases CRIT Rate by {placeholder} for 2 rounds. Every critical hit restores {placeholder} Rage.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Have Saya in the lineup.Activation Effect: When Saya dies, Kanata joins the battle or revives instantly with 100% HP and Rage."}

uniqueSkill.name: Thousand Sorrows
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Every drop represents a thousand sorrows. Kanata splits the earth with her spear, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies, and increasing damage to enemies in the back column by {placeholder}."}

specialSkill.name: Lonely Boat
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Listening to the rain on a lonely boat. Kanata suddenly grabs her spear and sprints away like a flying arrow, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies, and increasing damage to enemies in the back column by {placeholder}.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Morning Moon
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
